definition: the West/abbr. for Spain 西班牙[Xi1 ban1 ya2]/Spanish

li, ancient measure of length, approx. 500 m/neighborhood/ancient administrative unit of 25 families/(Tw) borough, administrative unit between the township 鎮|镇[zhen4] and neighborhood 鄰|邻[lin2] levels

sentences.english: This would not have been a surprise to Cyril Fagan.
sentences.chinese: 這對西里爾費根來說不會是一個驚喜。

sentences.english: St. Cyril did not last long on the throne of St.
sentences.chinese: 聖西里爾並沒有在聖馬可的寶座上持續很長時間。

sentences.english: The memorial to Cyril and Methodius.
sentences.chinese: 西里爾和墨索迪烏斯紀念碑。

sentences.english: Cyril has very little affection for him.
sentences.chinese: 西里爾對他沒有什麼感情。

sentences.english: ' What did it say?' asked Cyril.
Cyril went into the shop and the others waited outside.
sentences.chinese: 西里爾走進商店，其他孩子在外邊等着。

sentences.english: 'But then we couldn't get down again be-cause the door was locked.
sentences.chinese: 西里爾說，“可是我們下不來了，因爲門被鎖上了。”

sentences.english: Although born in South Africa, Cyril Cusack was brought up in Ireland.
sentences.chinese: 雖然出生在南非，西里爾庫薩克是帶來了在愛爾蘭。
